maqras.text: 94|1|(napiye!) Umatu ullattai nam umakku virivakkavillaiya
94|2|umatu cumaiyaiyum um'maivittum nam irakkivittom
94|3|atu, umatu ituppaiye murittuk kontiruntatu
94|4|umatu kirttiyaiyum nam uyarttinom
94|5|niccayamaka ciramattutan caukariyam irukkiratu
94|6|meyyakave ciramattutan caukariyam irukkiratu
94|7|akave, (markkap piraccarattiliruntu) nir vitupattatum, (iraivanai vanankuvatarku) cirattai etuppiraka
94|8|melum, (tunpattilum inpattilum) umatu iraivanaiye nir nokki nirpiraka
95|1|attiyin mitum,jeytunin mitum cattiyamaka
95|2|sinay malaiyin mitum cattiyamaka
95|3|apayamalikkum innakarattin mitum cattiyamaka
95|4|niccayamaka nam manitanai mikka alakana amaippil pataittirukkirom
95|5|(avanutaiya tiya natattaiyin karanamakap) pinnar, avanait talntavarkalilum talntavanaka nam akki vitukirom
95|6|ayinum, evarkal nampikkaikontu narceyalkalaic ceytu varukirarkalo avarkalait tavira. (Avarkal melana tanmaiyil iruppatutan) avarkalukku (enrenrume) tataipatata (nar)kuliyuntu
95|7|kuli kotukkum nalaip parri (napiye!) Itarkup pinnar, um'mai evartan poyyakka mutiyum
95|8|tirppalippavarkalil ellam, allah mika melana nitipatiyallava
96|1|(napiye! Anaittaiyum) pataitta umatu iraivanin peyaral (avanatu kattalaikal atankiya tiru kur'anai) otuviraka
96|2|avane manitanai irattakkattiyiliruntu pataikkiran
96|3|(napiye! Melum) nir otuviraka! Umatu iraivan maperum kotaiyali
96|4|Avantan elutukolaik kontu (elutak) karruk kotuttan
96|5|(atan mulam) manitan ariyatavarrai ellam avanukkuk karruk kotukkiran
96|6|(ivvariruntum,) manitan (avanukku nanri celuttuvatarkup patilakat) tannai (iraivanin aruliliruntu) tevaiyarravan enru meyyakave ennikkontu, avanukku maru ceykiran
96|7|(ivvariruntum,) manitan (avanukku nanri celuttuvatarkup patilakat) tannai (iraivanin aruliliruntu) tevaiyarravan enru meyyakave ennikkontu, avanukku maru ceykiran
96|8|niccayamaka umatu iraivan pakkamtan (avan) mila ventum
96|9|(napiye!) Or atiyar tolutal, atait tatai ceykinravanai nir (kavanittup) parttira
96|10|(napiye!) Or atiyar tolutal, atait tatai ceykinravanai nir (kavanittup) parttira
96|11|avar nerana pataiyil iruntukontu, iraiyaccattai evikkontiruntum (avarai avan tatai ceyvatai) nir (kavanittup) parttira
96|12|avar nerana pataiyil iruntukontu, iraiyaccattai evikkontiruntum (avarai avan tatai ceyvatai) nir (kavanittup) parttira
96|13|(avan, avaraip) poyyakkip purakkanippataiyum nir kavanittira
96|14|(avan ceyyum inta tusta kariyankalai) niccayamaka allah parkkiran enpatai avan arintu kollavillaiya
96|15|(ivvaru avan ceyvatu) takatu; (inta tusta ceyaliliruntu) avan vilakik kollavitil, kurram ceyyum appoyyanin mun kutumiyaip pitittu nam iluppom
96|16|(ivvaru avan ceyvatu) takatu; (inta tusta ceyaliliruntu) avan vilakik kollavitil, kurram ceyyum appoyyanin mun kutumiyaip pitittu nam iluppom
96|17|akave, avan (tan utavikkakat) tan capaiyorai alaikkattum
96|18|Namum (avanai narakattirku anuppa, narakattin) kavalalikalai alaippom
96|19|(napiye!) Niccayamaka nir avanukkuk kilppatiyatir. (Umatu iraivanukkuc) ciram panintu vananki (avanai) nerunkuviraka
97|1|niccayamaka nam inta kur'anai (mikka kanniyamulla) lailatul katr ennum or iravil (mutalavataka) irakkivaittom
97|2|(napiye!) Antak kanniyamulla iravin makimaiyai nir arivira
97|3|kanniyamulla anta iravu ayiram matankalai vita mikka melanatakum
97|4|atil vanavarkalum, jiprayilum, tankal iraivanin kattalaiyin pati (nataipera ventiya) ella kariyankalutan irankukinranar
97|5|‘‘salam'' (iterram) untakuka! (Avviravin iccirappu) vitiyarkalai utayamakum varai (nitikkiratu)

98|1|itai nirakarikkum vetattaiyutaiyavarkalilum, inaivaittu vanankupavarkalilum palar, tankalitam telivana attatci varum varai (oru telivana attatci vantal, ataip pinparra ventum enra nallennattil iruntu) vilakatu (urutiyakave) iruntanar
98|2|(avarkalitam vantirukkum telivana attatci ennavenral, avarkalukkup) paricuttamana vetankalai otik kanpikkakkutiya allahvinutaiya (intat) tutartan
98|3|(avar otik kanpikkum) atil nilaiyana catta tittankale varaiyappattirukkinrana

98|4|(avarkalin varavai etirparttu, avarkalaip pinparruvatakak kurik kontirunta) vetattai utaiyavarkal tankalitam telivana attatci(yakiya nam tutar) vantatan pinnar (avarukku) maruceytu pilavupattu vittanar

98|5|(Eninum, avarkal) iraivanutaiya kalapparra markkattaiye pinparri, marra markkankalaip purakkanittu, allah oruvanaiye vananki, tolukaiyaiyum kataippitittu, jakattum kotuttu varumare tavira, (veretuvum ittutar mulam) avarkalukku evappatavillai. (Itu, avarkalutaiya vetattilum evappatta visayamtan.) Itutan nilaiyana cattankalutaiya markkam

98|6|akave, vetattaiyutaiyavarkalilum, inaivaittu vanankupavarkalilum, (inta napiyin varavai etirparttiruntavarkalil) evarkal (avarai) nirakarikkirarkalo avarkal niccayamaka naraka neruppil tan irupparkal. Atil, avarkal enrenrume tankivituvarkal. Ivarkaltan pataippukalil maka kettavarkal
98|7|ayinum, (inta napiyin varavai etirparttiruntavarkalil) evarkal(avarai) nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceykirarkalo avarkale, niccayamaka pataippukalil mikac cirantavarkal

98|8|avarkalutaiya kuli avarkalin iraivanitattil ulla ‘atn' ennum nilaiyana corkkankalakum. Avarril niraruvikal totarntu otikkonteyirukkum. Enrenrume avarkal atil nirantaramaka tankivituvarkal. Allahvum avarkalaip parri tiruptiyataivan. Avarkalum allahvaip parri tirupti ataivarkal. Evar tan iraivanukkup payappatukiraro, avarukkuttan inta pakkiyam kitaikkum
99|1|(pukampattal) pumi palamaka acaikkappatumpotu
99|2|atu, tan cumantiruppavarrai (ellam veliyil) erintuvitum camayattil
99|3|manitan (titukkittu) ‘itarkenna nerntatu' (en ivvaru acaikkappattatu?) Enru ketpan
99|4|annalil atu, tanakkut terintavarrai ellam arivittu vitum
99|5|(ivvare) umatu iraivan vahyi mulam (tanakku) kattalaiyittirukkiran enru kurum
99|6|Annalil manitarkal, (nanmaiyo timaiyo) tankal ceyta ceyalkalaik kanpatarkaka(p pala pirivukalakap pirintu) kuttam kuttamaka (vicaranaikkaka) varuvarkal
99|7|akave, evar or anuvalavu nanmai ceytiruntaro avar, (anku) ataiyum kantukolvar
99|8|(avvare) evan or anuvalavu timai ceytiruntano, ataiyum avan (anku) kantu kolvan
100|1|muccut tinara ativekamakac cellum kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka
100|2|(avai cellum vekattil kulampukaliliruntu) neruppaik kakkum
100|3|innum avai atikalaiyil (etirikal mitum) payntu cellum
100|4|(avvaru vekamakac cellumpotu, mekattaippol) pulutiyaik kilappum
100|5|pinnar, (etirikalin pataiyin) mattiyil nulaintuvitum
100|6|(ittakaiya kutiraikal mitu cattiyamaka!) Niccayamaka manitan tan iraivanukku nanrikettavan avan
100|7|niccayamaka avane itarkuc catciyavan
100|8|niccayamaka avan porulkalai mikka katinamakave necikkiran
